name: ShadowSpire
description:
Light the way with your disembodied skull, or hide in the shadows where you are more powerful.  Shadow Spire has you to balancing light and dark to complete levels.

You play as a shadow creature, who carries around a skull lamp.
Throw the lamp, to cast shadows on difficult jumps. Call the light back to reveal traps and enemies.

This game is in a very early alpha stage. 
your feedback will be very helpful!

Thanks
-Wubs
